nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars Battles (LSWB) is an announced real-time player-versus-player mobile game made by Playdemic. With battlefields set across the galaxy, an array of Star Wars characters and vehicles may be selected by players for battle against other players.

On September 3, 2019, the game was announced for a 2020 release. StarWars.com formerly included the text "coming 2020," but after the year ended without an official release, it changed to "coming soon." However, the game beta and later the game itself was released in various countries. In the game beta, players chose their user names from randomized combinations of an adjective, a species name, and a two-digit number. In late May of 2021, an in-game message announced that the game is set to be closed officially on July 1 of that year.

Lead an army of LEGO® Star Wars™ characters into real-time multiplayer PvP battles in arenas inspired by iconic locations from throughout the galaxy! Collect and upgrade LEGO Star Wars characters, troops, and vehicles and craft formidable light and dark side armies. Build LEGO towers on the battlefield to strategically attack, defend, and capture territory as you push towards the enemy base to claim victory!
